description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Whoa - an ATM that spits out money, all you need to do is move your remote controlled piggy banks to catch it as it falls from the sky.  One or Two Players.
description.short: Whoa - an ATM that spits out money, all you need to do is move your remote controlled piggy banks to catch it as it falls from the sky.  One or Two Players.
